definition.name: AWS Secrets Manager GitHub Action
definition.description: GitHub action for retrieving secrets from AWS Secrets Manager
definition.author: AWS Secrets Manager

inputs.name: secret-ids
inputs.description: One or more secret names, secret ARNs, or secret prefixes to retrieve

inputs.name: parse-json-secrets
inputs.description: (Optional) If true, JSON secrets will be deserialized, creating a secret environment variable for each key-value pair.

inputs.name: name-transformation
inputs.description: (Optional) Transforms environment variable name. Options: uppercase, lowercase, none. Default value: uppercase.

inputs.name: auto-select-family-attempt-timeout
inputs.description: (Optional) Timeout (ms) for dual-stack DNS first IP connection attempt. Needed for geographically distant GitHub action workers

evidence.reasoning: This action retrieves secrets, which is a form of authentication for accessing sensitive information. It also manages dependencies by providing necessary secrets for other actions or processes.
